Delivery

Class Manifest

  • java.lang.Object
    • Delivery.Manifest

  • public class Manifest
extends java.lang.Object
    A manifest class used for storing trucks that contain stocks of items that need to be delivered
    Author:
    Brendan Doncaster
    See Also:
    Truck, Stock, Item

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Manifest()
      Manifest constructor class, creates a new array list of trucks

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTruck(Truck truck)
      Add a truck to the manifest's list
      Truck importTruck(java.lang.String string)
      Create a new truck and add it to the manifest based on a string representation of the truck type
      static Manifest manifestToExport()
      Creates an optimal manifest based on the store's inventory and which items need to be reordered.
      java.lang.String printManifest()
      Getter method for the printable version of the manifest, follows the style of a '>' before each truck and a new line after each truck/item
      Truck[] returnManifest()
      Getter method for returning the manifest's list as an array
      double sumManifestCost()
      Sum the cost of all trucks and items within the manifest

    • Constructor Detail

      • Manifest

        public Manifest()
        Manifest constructor class, creates a new array list of trucks
        See Also:
        Truck

    • Method Detail

      • addTruck

        public void addTruck(Truck truck)
        Add a truck to the manifest's list
        Parameters:
        truck - Truck to ba added to the manifest

      • returnManifest

        public Truck[] returnManifest()
        Getter method for returning the manifest's list as an array
        Returns:
        An array of trucks from the manifest

      • printManifest

        public java.lang.String printManifest()
        Getter method for the printable version of the manifest, follows the style of a '>' before each truck and a new line after each truck/item
        Returns:
        String version of the Trucks and their contents

      • importTruck

        public Truck importTruck(java.lang.String string)
                  throws DeliveryException
        Create a new truck and add it to the manifest based on a string representation of the truck type
        Parameters:
        string - String representation of a truck type
        Returns:
        Truck that was just added to the manifest
        Throws:
        DeliveryException - when the input truck type is not recognized

      • manifestToExport

        public static Manifest manifestToExport()
                                 throws DeliveryException,
                                        StockException
        Creates an optimal manifest based on the store's inventory and which items need to be reordered.
        Returns:
        Manifest to be exported for reordering that has been optimally sorted
        Throws:
        DeliveryException - when adding an item to a truck throws a DeliveryException
        StockException - when subtracting the already added items from the stock that needs to be reordered throws a StockException

      • sumManifestCost

        public double sumManifestCost()
                       throws DeliveryException
        Sum the cost of all trucks and items within the manifest
        Returns:
        double value for the cost of the manifest
        Throws:
        DeliveryException - Manifest contains a refrigerated truck with no refrigerated items and therefore has no cost
